title: Early sound films
brief_description: Short extracts from the following early sound films which were milestones in the history of Cinema: ‘The Jazz Singer’, ‘The Lights of New York’, ‘On With The Show’, ‘Show of Shows’, ‘In Old Arizona’, ‘All Quiet on the Western Front’.
